response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value and capabilities, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $13,500 for this exceptional product. This offer allows you to benefit from its features while keeping the cost within a manageable range. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 13500}
